body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Notification reads: Player returns each creature card with converted mana cost Xfrom his or her graveyard [...]

missing a space between X and from

nothing to worry about, though. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Immortal Servitude: minor format mistake

comments.body:
Fixed in Revision ac2cd79f2e5e

**Status:** Fixed  
  **Owner:** ShawnieBoyUK
